attributes.action: request that the football league MAINTAIN the 15-point deduction from Leeds United AFC.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Leeds United have shown scant regard for their small creditors (most of whom cannot afford to lose the money) in their behaviour over the administration and subsequent sale of the club. The Football League needs to act with integrity and maintain the principle that clubs cannot just walk away from their debts and then magically find money to mount a promotion bid. The 15-point handicap is fair and just.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
